attributes.action: Parliament should debate whether or not to invoke article 50.
attributes.additional_details: The results of this referendum are documented daily and are a cause for concern.Action is urgently needed as soon as the political parties have their Leaders and  ministers in place.
attributes.background: The Referendum is not legally binding and Parliament is sovereign.In the light of the lies and misinformation on which the public voted,the credibility of the result is questionable.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
